joint_position_dynamic_reconfigure_server

Small node that spins up a dynamic reconfigure server that can be used to change the joint positions.

Module Contents

Classes

JointPositionDynamicReconfigureServer

Attributes

position_dyn_server

class joint_position_dynamic_reconfigure_server.JointPositionDynamicReconfigureServer[source]
callback(config, level)[source]

Dynamic reconfigure callback function.

Parameters:

  • config (dynamic_reconfigure.encoding.Config) – The current dynamic reconfigure configuration object.

  • level (int) – Bitmask that gives information about which parameter has been changed.

Returns:

Modified dynamic reconfigure

configuration object.

Return type:

Config
